titleStmt.title: At a Common Councel holden in the Guild-hall London on VVednesday the 14th of December, 1659.
titleStmt.author: City of London (England). Court of Common Council.
Alleyne, Thomas, Sir, fl. 1660.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by James Flesher, Printer to the Honourable City of London,

notesStmt.note: Aleyn Mayor = Sir Thomas Alleyne, mayor of London in 1659-60.
An order of the Common Council, for preserving the peace of the city at the forthcoming meeting of Parliament.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
